properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Tidal Potomac from Indian Head to Cobb Island MD; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 22 at 12:01AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
Wind gusts around 20 knots are being observed tonight in some
locations on the tidal Potomac River downstream of the U S 301
bridge, the Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point to Smith Point, and
Tangier Sound. The most susceptible locations to these gusts will
be where there an open fetch over the water to the north-
northwest winds. These gusts should be diminishing by 3 AM.

Mariners, especially those in smaller craft, should exercise
caution and be prepared for locally higher winds and waves.
